property.name: fieldId
property.label: Field Id
property.description: Field Id - must be unique to this process

property.name: labelFontSize
property.label: Label Font Size
property.description: Label Font Size - Small, Medium or Large

property.name: widthLengthWise
property.label: Fixed Width Display Length (Known case)
property.description: The length of the text field based on character count - 2, 3, 4, 5, 10 or 20

property.name: widthQuarterWise
property.label: Fixed Width Display Length (Unknown case)
property.description: The length of the text field based on assumption - one-quarter, one-third, one-half, two-thirds, three-quarters or full

property.name: hintText
property.label: Hint Text
property.description: Hint Text - appears below the label giving the user a hint

property.name: regexPattern
property.label: Regular Expression
property.description: The regular expression the field should conform to

property.name: autocompleteType
property.label: Autocomplete Type?
property.description: The Autocomplete Type value is required to use autocomplete functionality, give values based on WCAG 2.1 Level AA.

property.name: spellcheckRequired
property.label: Spellcheck Required?
property.description: The Spellcheck function is required or not on the field

property.name: maxCharacterCount
property.label: Maximum Character Count
property.description: The maximum length of the string in the field

property.name: showCharacterCount
property.label: Show Character Count
property.description: Shows the user the character count and the maximum character count
